name: Quick Move Buttons
description: Adds move buttons outside the Edit tab.

scale-btns.name: Scale Button
scale-btns.description: Change the scale of the transform buttons, <co>draggable area also be affected.</co> <cr>Required to reopen the editor to take effect.</cr>

opacity-btn.name: Button Opacity
opacity-btn.description: Change the opacity of the transform buttons. <cr>This does not affect the button background and applies whenever you drag the buttons</cr>

scale-bg.name: Scale Draggable Area
scale-bg.description: Change the scale of the draggable area. <cg>Useful if you can't drag properly due to the area size.</cg> <cr>Required to reopen the editor to take effect.</cr>

visible-bg.name: Show Button Background
visible-bg.description: Show the background of the transform buttons. <cr>Required to reopen the editor to take effect.</cr>

menu-btn.name: Show Draggable Area
menu-btn.description: Show the draggable area for transform buttons. <cg>Useful if you want to know the draggable area.</cg>

no-dragging.name: Disable Dragging
no-dragging.description: Disable dragging on the transform buttons. <cg>Useful if you want your buttons to stay in a fixed position and prevent accidental dragging.</cg>

presistent-btn.name: Button Presistent
presistent-btn.description: Always show the transform buttons, even when an object is not selected.
